body:
#### PR description:

##### Bugs fixed:
- Store (slightly extended) NanoAod `finalGenparticles` instead of MiniAod `prunedGenParticles` -> restores correct indices into `GenPart` collection for all leptons
- Store constituents of AK8 jets (as originally intended?)

##### New features:
- `JetPFCands_jetSVIdx`: link PFCands to secondary vertices within a jet
- `PFCands_genCandIdx` links PFCands to matched GenCands (charged, dR<0.02)
- `GenCands_genPartMotherIdx`: link GenCands to mother
- `GenCands_isFromB/C`: 1 from any B/C hadron, 2 from final (weakly decaying) B/C hadron

=> allows to determine whether a PFCand stems from a b/c hadron, needed for fragmentation studies in style of [HIN-24-005](https://cms-results.web.cern.ch/cms-results/public-results/preliminary-results/HIN-24-005/index.html)

#### PR validation:

With ttbar lepton+jets sample:
`cmsDriver.py btvNanoMC --mc --eventcontent NANOAODSIM --datatier NANOAODSIM --conditions auto:phase1_2023_realistic --step NANO:@BTV --nThreads 4 --era Run3,run3_nanoAOD_pre142X --filein /store/mc/Run3Summer23MiniAODv4/TTtoLNu2Q_TuneCP5_13p6TeV_powheg-pythia8/MINIAODSIM/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v14-v2/2520000/0092e4e1-8cb2-4c2f-b57a-4fa2f42a517f.root --no_exec -n 100`

##### File size:
Before: All Events data	 	 	 	13.59
After: All Events data	 	 	 	13.34

##### Local testing of jet and particle associations:
```
# Cand matching checks
Events->Draw("JetPFCands_pt - PFCands_pt[JetPFCands_pFCandsIdx]")
PASS
Events->Draw("GenJetCands_pt - GenCands_pt[GenJetCands_genCandsIdx]")
PASS

# Cands to jet matching
Events->Draw("PFCands_eta[JetPFCands_pFCandsIdx] - Jet_eta[JetPFCands_jetIdx]")
PASS
Events->Draw("PFCands_eta[FatJetPFCands_pFCandsIdx] - FatJet_eta[FatJetPFCands_jetIdx]")
PASS

# SV to JetSV  matching
Events->Draw("JetSVs_mass - SV_mass[JetSVs_sVIdx]", "JetSVs_sVIdx>-1")
PASS
Events->Draw("Jet_eta[0] - SV_eta[JetSVs_sVIdx]", "JetSVs_sVIdx>-1 && JetSVs_jetIdx==0")
PASS

# Cands to SV matching
Events->Draw("PFCands_eta[JetPFCands_pFCandsIdx] - SV_eta[JetSVs_sVIdx[JetPFCands_jetSVIdx]]", "JetPFCands_jetSVIdx>-1 && JetSVs_sVIdx[JetPFCands_jetSVIdx]>-1")
PASS

# PFCands to GenCands
Events->Draw("PFCands_eta - GenCands_eta[PFCands_genCandIdx]", "PFCands_genCandIdx>-1")
PASS

# Muons to GenPart (pre-check to GenPart mother)
Events->Draw("Muon_eta - GenPart_eta[Muon_genPartIdx]", "Muon_genPartIdx>-1")
PASS

# GenCands to GenPart mothers
Events->Draw("GenCands_eta - GenPart_eta[GenCands_genPartMotherIdx]", "GenCands_genPartMotherIdx>1 && GenCands_isFromB==2")
PASS
```
title: [NanoAOD,BTVNano] Bugfixes and object linking
